---
title: EMMONS MITCHELL CONSTRUCTION
author: ''
date: '2022-08-29'
slug: emmons_mitchell_construction
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $13.5M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with EMMONS MITCHELL CONSTRUCTION. The average
  contract duration was 1.19 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.8M.
  The longest contract was 2.43 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $13.2M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '13.5M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '15'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '9'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '60%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '45%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '2.33'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '2.7M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '1.19'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '1.8M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '2.43'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '13.2M'
---
